snippet: World stock markets mostly drifted lower Friday ahead of Greece’s weekend referendum, while China’s main stock benchmark plunged as government efforts failed to reassure panicky investors.
abstract: World stock markets mainly fall ahead of Greece's national referendum on its debt crisis; China's market plummets.
lead_paragraph: World stock markets mostly drifted lower Friday ahead of Greece’s weekend referendum, while China’s main stock benchmark plunged as government efforts failed to reassure panicky investors.

headline.main: Markets Watch Greece, and China Market Continues Tumble
headline.print_headline: Markets Watch Greece, and China Continues a Tumble
